oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Taking Down the Eiffel Tower
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Models; Engineering; Towers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When the model of the Eiffel Tower was removed in 1992, it was given to the city of Paris, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
